result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Markece D. McCovery

records.addlTxt:
09:31 AM    Attorney Dan Tombasco appeared for the State. Defendant, Markece D. McCovery, appeared with Attorney Alyssah M Foster.   Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: Attorney Foster is requesting an adjournment as she has not received an offer from the State yet. The State does not object. Court adjourns.  Status conference scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: SPD has not yet appointed attorney

01:54 PM  State appeared by Attorney Drew Lehman. DE appears in person pro se.   Clerk P. Scypta.  
MINUTES:   SPD has determined DE is eligible, though no attorney has yet been assigned. Matter set over. JS removed from Court's calendar.  Status conference scheduled for September 2, 2022 at 09:30 am.

10:07 AM Defendant, Markece D. McCovery, appeared.  Attorney Drew Lehman appeared for the Prosecution. Clerk: S.Shaw.
MINUTES: Deft was previously denied by SPD in error. Deft to report to the SPD's office. The SPD believes that he is eligible. Matter set over.  Status conference scheduled for July 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
from the court re: Judicial Rotation mailed to the DE

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  *No VIOLENT Contact or Discussion of Case w/Raven F.

01:38 PM    State appears by Attorney Alexandra Smathers.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Brian Rolf.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Plea of Not Guilty entered.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 10, 2022 at 01:15 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 7, 2022 at 10:10 am.  Jury selection scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 09:00 am.  $400  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).  ts
and witness list filed by the State
